item.title: Tinkr provides custom calligraphy necklaces
item.description:
Source: Tinkr website. The company Tinkr is offering custom-made pendants. These pendants are unique corporate gifts because they are designed using a person’s actual handwriting. Starting at S$78, the company will craft a pendant featuring up to two words written in the handwriting provided. For those who prefer professional calligraphy, Tinkr offers this service starting at S$98. Veronica Halim, Tinkr’s in-house calligrapher, would design the calligraphy. Source: Tinkr newsletter...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/tinkr-provides-custom-calligraphy-necklaces/
